lead_paragraph: A harshly worded four-volume report said Brian Mulroney had acted inappropriately in accepting “cash-stuffed envelopes” during meetings with a German arms and aviation lobbyist.
snippet: A harshly worded four-volume report said Brian Mulroney had acted inappropriately in accepting “cash-stuffed envelopes” during meetings with a German arms and aviation lobbyist.

headline.main: Inquiry Faults Ex-Canadian Leader on Cash From Lobbyist
headline.seo: Inquiry Faults Ex-Canadian Prime Minister Mulroney for Taking Cash From Lobbyist
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Faults Ex-Canadian Leader on Cash From Lobbyist
